title: missing rp
body: i haven't gotten my free 400 rp with the new account I made. I am level 5 and I have done all the tutorials. I don't know what is wrong.

replies.body: With Hextech Crafting being a thing now, we replaced the 400 RP New accounts receive with a special Hextech Chest.  For more information and reasoning about the change, check out [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp)

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=45smUPNv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-10T02:24:47.092+0000)
>
> With Hextech Crafting being a thing now, we replaced the 400 RP New accounts receive with a special Hextech Chest.  For more information and reasoning about the change, check out [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp)

Also make sure you verify your account. Happen to me first time.
